author: DragonWrangler
long_description:
Adds several hopefully helpful commands to help you with modding.

You renaming a big game ? This may help.
You accidently mess up on schematics ? This may help.
You want to verify if your schematics have known nodes ? This may help.
You want to go through all you many mods and find a certain word to replace ? This may help.
You have a file that you want to check for whitespace errors ? This may help.

This mod is Singleplayer only. DO NOT USE IN MULTIPLAYER

You can find the readme.md file [here](https://github.com/DragonWrangler1/modding_commands/blob/main/README.md)

Please view the readme if you have questions. And please MAKE BACKUPS. This is experimental. It works, but just as a precaution.

This mod requires minetest.request_insecure_environment.
name: modding_commands
short_description: Adds Hopefully helpful commands for modding
title: Modding Commands
